Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Methods
com.admob.android.ads.AdView.getTextColor()
          Replaced by AdView.getPrimaryTextColor() and AdView.getSecondaryTextColor(). 
com.admob.android.ads.AdView.isGoneWithoutAd()
          See AdView.setGoneWithoutAd(boolean) for details. 
com.admob.android.ads.AdView.setGoneWithoutAd(boolean)
          For setGoneWithoutAd(true) set the width and/or height to WRAP_CONTENT or FILL_PARENT. For setGoneWithoutAd(false) set the width to 320dip and height to 48dip. 
com.admob.android.ads.AdView.setTextColor(int)
          Replaced by AdView.setPrimaryTextColor(int) and AdView.setSecondaryTextColor(int).
